text: The 2001–02 NSW Premier League season was the second season of the revamped NSW Premier League. From the original ten teams in the inaugural version of the Premier League, two more were added for the follow-up tournament. They were Bankstown City Lions and Fairfield Bulls. The Parramatta Eagles took out the double winning the Championship and the Premiership. ==Clubs== Teams promoted from Super League: (After the end of the 2001 season.) * Bankstown City Lions * Fairfield Bulls Teams relegated to Super League: (After the end of the 2000–01 season.) * Nil {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:100%;" !
